alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 12:06AM CDT until July 11 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Garfield County in north central Nebraska... Wheeler County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1206 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles east of Fort Hartsuff State Park to 9 miles south of Ericson to near Scotia, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Ericson and Pibel Lake State Recreation Area. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 132 and 146. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
